definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)

sentences.english: We resolutely support your just struggle for national liberation.
sentences.chinese: 我們堅決支持你們爭取民族解放的正義鬥爭。

sentences.english: We will, as always, firmly support your just struggle.
sentences.chinese: 我們將一如既往堅決支持你們的正義鬥爭。

sentences.english: The just struggles of the people of all countries support each other.
sentences.chinese: 全世界各國人民的正義鬥爭，都是互相支持的。

sentences.english: We firmly backed the just struggle of the oppressed peoples for liberation.
sentences.chinese: 我們堅持支持背壓迫民族爭取解放的正義鬥爭。

sentences.english: Democracy, States, and the Struggle for Global Justice.
sentences.chinese: 民主，國家，全球正義鬥爭。

sentences.english: The just struggle against each country people's is supported mutually.
sentences.chinese: 各國人民的正義鬥爭互相支持。

sentences.english: We will bravely step forward to support the just struggle.
sentences.chinese: 我們將勇敢地站出來支持正義鬥爭。

sentences.english: The just struggles by the people in different countries supported each other.
sentences.chinese: 各國人民的正義鬥爭都是互相支持的。

sentences.english: They will bravely step forward to support the just struggle of the workers.
sentences.chinese: 他們將勇敢地站出來，支持工人的正義鬥爭。
